title: She Dreams in Blood
description: Drawn by the shards of his obsidian heart, Khraen follows the path south. The islands, largely ignored by the Wizardâ€™s Guild, have become a refuge for the unwanted of the world. Necromancers and sorcerers rule warring tribes haunted by the ghosts of savage and primal gods.With each fragment Khraen discovers more of the man he was.There was an Empire.There was a god.And she dreamed in blood.
author: Michael R. Fletcher
